article_title: The Rev. Al Sharpton speaks at Gillfield Baptist Church on Sunday
article_text:
The Rev. Al Sharpton speaks at Gillfield Baptist Church on Sunday

Gillfield Baptist Church was a full house Sunday as the Rev. Al Sharpton came as guest speaker and delivered a powerful sermon.
